text: 11:29 Godɨn Araziba 27:11-14; Josua 8:33-35Egh Ikiavɨra Itir God, ia inigh nguibar ia datɨrɨghɨn dapiamimɨn mangɨtɨ, ia bar Gerisimɨn Mɨghsɨam ko Ebalɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn mangɨ. Egh ian tarazi Gerisimɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn tugh kamaghɨn dɨm suam, God e bagh bizir aghuaribar amuam. Eghtɨ ian tarazi Ebalɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn tugha kamaghɨn dɨm suam, God e gasɨghasɨgham.
